data.text: Dhako mariek gero ode,
Ngʼat ma wuodhe oriere oluoro Jehova Nyasaye,
Wuoyo mar ngʼama ofuwo kelone mana goch e ngʼeye,
Kama onge rwedhi, dipo bedo nono,
Janeno ma ja-adiera ok riambi,
Ngʼat ma jasunga nyalo dwaro rieko to ok oyud gimoro,
Bed mabor gi ngʼat mofuwo
Rieko mar jorieko en bedo gi paro ne yoregi,
Joma ofuwo jaro kowachnegi mondo giwe richo,
Chuny ka chuny ongʼeyo litne owuon,
Od ngʼat marach ibiro ketho
Nitie yo manenore ne dhano ni nikare,
Kata e kinde mar nyiero, chuny nyalo bedo gi lit,
Joma onge yie ibiro mi pok moromo gi timbegi,
Ngʼat mangʼeyone tin thoro yie gimoro amora,
Ngʼat mariek oluoro Jehova Nyasaye kendo okwedo richo,
Ngʼat ma iye wangʼ piyo timo gik mofuwo,
Joma ngʼeyogi tin nwangʼo fuwo,
Joricho kulore e nyim joma beyo,
Jochan ok dwar kata gi jobutgi,
Ngʼatno machayo jabute timo richo,
Donge jogo machano marach lal nono?
Tich matek duto kelo ohala,
Mwandu jomariek e osimbo margi,
Janeno ma ja-adiera reso ji e tho,
Ngʼat moluoro Jehova Nyasaye nigi ohinga motegno,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye en soko mar ngima,
Ruoth ma joge ngʼeny ema yudo duongʼ,
Ngʼat ma terore mos nigi winjo,
Chuny man-gi kwe kelo ngima ni ringruok,
Ngʼat masando jochan nyiso achaya ne Jal mane ochweyogi,
Ka masira obiro, joricho itieko,
Rieko odak e chuny ngʼat ma weche donjone,
Tim makare tingʼo oganda malo,
Ruoth mor gi jatich mariek,
